```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  fig.retina = 3,
  comment = "#>"
)
library(fontawesome)
library(dplyr)
charts <- gsheet::gsheet2tbl('https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Zj1jXqV5XsAXeIkUPzCJkvMrU5ah_y6VHb-san0Baio/edit?usp=sharing') %>% 
    mutate(
        url_repo = paste0("https://github.com/jhelvy/charts/tree/master/", name), 
        url_image = paste0("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jhelvy/charts/master/", name, "/plots/", name, ".png")
    )
```
